# File lib/paperclip.rb, line 306
    def validates_attachment_content_type name, options = {}
      types = [options.delete(:content_type)].flatten
      validates_each("#{name}_content_type""#{name}_content_type", options) do |record, attr, value|
        unless types.any?{|t| t === value }
          record.errors.add("#{name}_content_type""#{name}_content_type", :inclusion, :default => options[:message], :value => value)
        end
      end
    end
